#{taskno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BOXNO_BIND_HIS = #{boxnoBindHis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIND_PALLET_USER = #{bindPalletUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIND_PALLET_DATE = #{bindPalletDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ID_BINDER #{manualnotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_ZJK = #{statusZjk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASEOUTTIME = #{caseouttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_REFUSE = #{isRefuse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIPDATE = #{shipdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SEND_TYPE = #{sendType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGNER = #{signer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGNERDATE = #{signerdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RETURNER = #{returner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RETURNDATE = #{returndate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CASEID = #{caseid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CASEID_BAK = #{caseidBak,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
(select '未交包' ty, (case when fromtype = 0 and type = 0 then '主配发货' when (fromtype = 0 and type = 1) or (fromtype = 1 and type = 2) then '退货' when fromtype = 1 and type = 1 then '请配发货' end) type, caseid, batchno, consk, shortname, boxnoBind, boxnoBindWho, description, sum(caseqty) caseqty, sum(qty) qty, adddate from (select c.caseid, c.batchno, c.consk, c.shortname, c.boxno_bind boxnoBind, c.BOXNO_BIND_WHO boxnoBindWho, cd.fromtype, cd.type, st.description, send_type, nvl(c.susr1, 1) caseqty, sum(cd.qty) qty, c.adddate from caseid c join casedetail cd on c.caseid = cd.caseid and c.caseid_bak = cd.caseid_bak join storer st on c.doc_storerkey = st.storerkey where c.is_refuse = '0' and c.status in ('0') and to_char(c.adddate,'yyyy-mm-dd') between #{date_begin} and #{date_end}
and fromtype = 0 and cd.type = 0
and fromtype = 1 and cd.type = 1
and ((fromtype = 0 and cd.type = 1) or (fromtype = 1 and cd.type = 2))
and 1=2
and to_char(adddate,'yyyy-mm-dd') <> to_char(rec_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')
group by c.caseid, c.batchno, c.consk, c.shortname, c.boxno_bind , c.BOXNO_BIND_WHO, send_type, cd.fromtype, cd.type, st.description, nvl(c.susr1, 1), st.description, c.adddate order by send_type, adddate) group by caseid, batchno, consk, shortname, boxnoBind, boxnoBindWho,description, send_type, adddate, fromtype, type) union (select '未交包', '拒收', caseid, batchno, consk, shortname, boxnoBind, boxnoBindWho, description, sum(caseqty) caseqty, sum(qty) qty, adddate from (select c.caseid,c.batchno, c.consk, c.shortname, c.boxno_bind boxnoBind, c.BOXNO_BIND_WHO boxnoBindWho, st.description, send_type, nvl(c.susr1, 1) caseqty, 0 qty, c.adddate from caseid c join storer st on c.doc_storerkey = st.storerkey where c.is_refuse <>'0' and c.status in ('0') and to_char(c.adddate,'yyyy-mm-dd') between #{date_begin} and #{date_end}
and 1=2
and 1=2
and 1=2
group by c.caseid, c.batchno, c.consk, c.shortname, c.boxno_bind, c.BOXNO_BIND_WHO, send_type, st.description, nvl(c.susr1, 1), st.description, c.adddate order by send_type, adddate) group by caseid, batchno, consk, shortname, boxnoBind, boxnoBindWho,description, adddate) order by boxnobind
select nvl(sum(susr1),0) from caseid where susr5='拒收转打包不需上传' and to_char(editdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') between #{date_begin} AND #{date_end}
